item.title: Bloch Serenade Pointe Ballet Shoes
item.description: A wide platform for balancing en pointe. Longer vamp and firm shank help to prevent flexible feet from bending too far over pointe. Suited to a dancer with square shaped toes. Available with a stronger shank, S0131S.

item.title: Bloch Jetstream Ballet Pointe Shoe
item.description: The Jetstream pointe shoe has been created with an innovative box design exclusive to Bloch. The new EVA cushioned box molds to the contours of the foot for greater comfort and shock absorbency eliminating the need for additional padding. Carefully tailored upper lining to reduce creasing. Low profile for a perfect continuation of the leg line.

item.title: Bloch Serenade Strong Ballet Pointe Shoe
item.description: Stronger shank 2.5mm board. A wide platform for balancing en pointe. Longer vamp and firm shank help to prevent flexible feet from bending too far over pointe. Suited to a dancer with square shaped toes.

item.title: Bloch Suprima Ballet Pointe Shoe
item.description: Tapered shape for slender feet. Smaller platform and tapered box flatter the line of the leg. Has the smallest platform & most tapered box of all the Bloch pointe shoes. These two features give an aesthetically pleasing finish to the leg line. Also available with a stronger shank, S0132S.

item.title: Bloch Amalgam Sneaker
item.description: Crossover jazz shoe to dance sneaker with leather and mesh upper. Ultra lightweight, flexible design providing freedom to move for the feet through all positions. Feminine form with exaggerated arch profile creating an elegant fit. Dri-Lex lining that is non-wrinkling, breathable and odor/mildew resistant. Non-marking thin split sole and intelligent flat lacing system.

item.title: Elastosplit Canvas
item.description: The elastic system in the mid section of the ‘Elastosplit X’ replaces materials in the mid-foot to reveal the dancer’s arch and minimize bunching underfoot. The elastic system is in an X configuration and contours to the natural lines of the foot.

item.title: Bloch Proform Canvas Ballet Shoes
item.description: Canvas split sole with a specially shaped forefoot outsole pad to protect the metatarsals. Ridges underfoot are minimized for a flatter and more stable surface for turns and balances. Anti-bacterial cotton lining.

item.title: Bloch Pro Elastic Ballet Shoe
item.description: A canvas split sole ballet flat with elastic in place of binding and drawstring – the elastic contours to the foot, reduces pressure on the Achilles tendon and on the dorsal surface of the foot when it contacts the floor. Pre-sewn crossed instep elastics. Triangle stretch canvas arch insert that hugs the foot when pointing. Forefoot outsole pad shaped to protect the metatarsals.

item.title: Bloch Foot thong III
item.description: Double sided, suede leather forefoot pad protects the ball of the foot from abrasion, particularly in styles such as contemporary, jazz and lyrical. Silicon lined elastic secures forefoot pad to the foot. Thin suede strips in between the toes stop the pad from twisting.

item.title: Bloch Ballet Pointe Cushion (S/M)
item.description: Lightweight silicon pad to be worn with pointe shoes for protection while en pointe. Provides protection to toes from pressure associated with pointe work. Washable and re-usable. Can be cut to size required by dancer.

item.title: Bloch Gel Strip Pressure Protection
item.description: Gel coating to ease pressure from the joint.

item.title: Bloch Gel Tip (S/M) Pressure Protection
item.description:
Thimble like tips protect toe nails & joints.

Can be cut to size to fit shorter toes.

item.title: Bloch Bunion Guard Gel
item.description: Gel coating to protect.

item.title: Bloch Toe Separators
item.description: Helps alleviate inner toe friction and irritation caused by toe nails or corns.

item.title: Bloch Toe Spacer Max
item.description: Helps alleviate inner toe friction and irritation caused by toe nails or corns.

item.title: Bloch Prima Pro Pad (S/M)
item.description: Thin fabric base instead of gel reduces bulk. Darts on either side of the upper help to create a good fit.

item.title: Bloch Space Enhancer
item.description: Helps alleviate inner toe friction and irritation cause by toenails or corns.

item.title: Bloch Over Knee Leg Warmers
item.description:
Over knee leg warmer in fine gauge jersey knit. Ribbed trim at thigh and ankle, can be worn scrunched.

Fabric:
Plain Rib and Knit - Rayon / Nylon / Spandex

item.title: Bloch Tap - Flex Tap Shoe
item.description: Lace up split sole full grain leather upper and leather stacked heel. Exclusive Bloch 'sling technique' upper allowing the shoe to bend in one direction and give resistance in the other. Kashmir lining for comfort and to reduce moisture.  Heel notch to relieve pressure on the Achilles tendon.

item.description:
This Bloch Studio everyday 3/4 tight is made in our Bloch DRITEX™ high performance fabric. They are fully lined in the back leg panels for extra support to firm the thighs and rear. Ideal for a wide variety of workouts, walking, running, dancing, yoga & pilates.

Dritex / Softel

item.title: Bloch Trisole-Lo Ladies Jazz Shoe
item.description:
Multi arching jazz shoe that moves with dancer's foot across a full range of movement. 

Leather slip on with elastic instep. Rubber trisole - forefoot curls and flexes with the toes/ Rubber dots to protect the medial side of foot when contacting the floor.

item.title: Bloch Ladies Longline Crop Top
item.description:
This Bloch Studio crop top is made in our Bloch DRITEX™ high performance fabric. This style combines fashion and fitness to create a supportive bustiere style active crop top. Ideal for dance class, yoga, pilates and low impact exercise.

Fabric:

Dritex

This Bloch Studio open back active singlet is made in our Bloch DRITEX™ high performance fabric. The open back is a twist on the regular cross back cami which allows you to feel feminine and supported at the same time. Perfect for yoga, pilates and low to mid impact workouts.

Fabric:

Dritex

item.title: Bloch Gel Tip (L/XL) Pressure Protection
item.description:
Thimble like tips protect toe nails & joints.

Can be cut to size to fit shorter toes.

item.title: Bloch Pointe Cushion (M/L)
item.description:
Lightweight silicon pad to be worn with pointe shoes for protection while en pointe. Provides protection to toes from pressure associated with pointe work. Washable and re-usable. Can be cut to size required by dancer.

 

Size M/L fits pointe shoes size from UK 4.5 upwards.

item.title: Bloch Prima Pro Pad (M/L)
item.description:
Thin fabric base instead of gel reduces bulk. Darts on either side of the upper help to create a good fit.

 

Size M/L fits pointe shoes size from UK 4.5 upwards.
